title: The Disney channel. - Volume 2
brief_description: Memorable moments from the Disney channel are included on this tape including: GOOD MORNING MICKEY “Lion’s down”; Goofy features in this cartoon directed by Jack Kinney; WELCOME TO POOH CORNER “Spaghetti”; Tigger and Winnie the Pooh tackle some spaghetti, produced by Caroline Hay and directed by Donald R. Ham; THE MOUSE FACTORY “The Reluctant dragon”; Not all dragons breathe fire and wreak fear amongst men as this story shows, produced and directed by Ward Kimball; DONALD DUCK PRESENTS “A Day at Disneyland”; You’ll feel like you’ve been there after this expedition, produced by Matt Oppenheimer and directed by Barry Elliott; MOUSERCISE; Join Kellyn, Mickey and friends for some healthy exercise. Produced by George Taweel and directed by Gordon Myers.
